TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItem extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供工具箱項目的基底實作。

span.span: Provides a base implementation of a toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可顯示在設計階段環境工具箱中工具箱項目的基底類別。 is a base class for toolbox items that can be displayed in the toolbox of a design-time environment. 工具箱項目通常代表要在設計模式文件叫用時建立的元件。A toolbox item typically represents a component to create when invoked on a design mode document. 類別提供的方法和屬性提供 [工具箱] 的顯示屬性來建立元件或元件使用時，以及要序列化和還原序列化本身做為保存在工具箱中工具箱項目與所需資料庫。The class provides the methods and properties needed to provide the toolbox with the display properties for the toolbox item, to create a component or components when used, and to serialize and deserialize itself for persistence within the toolbox database. 執行個體類別可設定名稱、 點陣圖和要建立類型; 而建立的類別衍生自。An instance of the class can be configured with a name, bitmap, and type to create, without creating a class that derives from . 類別也提供基底類別的自訂工具箱項目實作。The class also provides a base class for custom toolbox item implementations. 自訂可以建立多個元件。A custom can create multiple components. 若要實作自訂工具箱項目，您必須衍生自並覆寫， ，和方法。To implement a custom toolbox item, you must derive from and override the , , and methods. 必須設定下列屬性和方法的才能正確運作：The following properties and methods must be configured for a to function correctly: - 屬性會指定當顯示工具箱中工具箱項目的標籤。The property specifies the label for the toolbox item when displayed in a toolbox. - 屬性會指定項目所建立的元件類型的完整的名稱。The property specifies the fully qualified name of the type of the component that the item creates. 如果衍生的類別會建立多個元件，屬性可能會或可能未使用，視是否方法覆寫這個屬性的值而定。If a derived class creates multiple components, the property may or may not be used, contingent on whether a method override depends on the value of this property. - 屬性會指定包含的項目所建立的元件類型的組件。The property specifies the assembly that contains the type of a component that the item creates. - 屬性選擇性地指定要顯示在工具箱中工具箱項目的顯示名稱旁邊的點陣圖影像。The property optionally specifies a bitmap image to display next to the display name for the toolbox item in the toolbox. - 屬性選擇性地包含任何判斷工具箱項目是否可以使用特定的元件上的物件。The property optionally contains any objects that determine whether the toolbox item can be used on a particular component. - 方法會傳回元件執行個體或執行個體將使用此工具的位置。The method returns the component instance or instances to insert where this tool is used. - 方法會將工具箱項目儲存至指定。The method saves the toolbox item to a specified . - 方法會設定工具箱項目中指定的狀態資訊從。The method configures the toolbox item from the state information contained in the specified . - 方法會設定工具箱項目來建立指定的類型的元件，如果方法不已覆寫以不同的方式。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type of component, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. - 屬性會指出是否可以變更工具箱項目的屬性。The property indicates whether the properties of the toolbox item can be changed. 加入至工具箱後，通常會鎖定工具箱項目。A toolbox item is typically locked after it is added to a toolbox. - 方法鎖定工具箱項目。The method locks a toolbox item. - 方法擲回例外狀況，如果屬性是`true`。The method throws an exception if the property is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供一個元件，利用加入文字的資料格式處理常式的介面或，在 [工具箱]。The following code example provides a component that uses the interface to add a text data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 資料的建立者回呼委派會傳遞任何文字資料貼到 [工具箱] 拖曳至表單，以自訂會建立包含的文字。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用當做自訂工具箱項目實作的基底類別的類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class as a base class for a custom toolbox item implementation. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定組件的名稱，該組件包含類型或工具箱項目所建立的類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the type or types that the toolbox item creates.

value.span: ，表示包含型別或型別所要建立的組件。

span.span: An that indicates the assembly containing the type or types to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定包含要建立的元件類型的組件。The property specifies the assembly that contains the types of the components to create.

para.span: 如果您衍生的工具箱項目類別建立位於不同的組件的多個元件，您必須確定這些組件的參考存在於您的專案。

span.span: If your derived toolbox item class creates multiple components that are located in different assemblies, you must ensure that references to these assemblies exist in your project.

para.span: 建議您最好將這些參考的多載，從方法。

span.span: It is advisable to add these references from an overload of the method.

para.span: 即使您方法不需依賴值屬性，您應該確定此屬性設定為其中一個來建立元件所屬的組件，因為它會顯示在**自訂工具箱** Visual Studio 中的對話方塊。

span.span: Even if your method does not depend on the value of the property, you should ensure that this property is set to the assembly that one of the components to create belongs to, because it is displayed in the **Customize Toolbox** dialog box in Visual Studio.

span.span: Gets or sets the filter that determines whether the toolbox item can be used on a destination component.
An of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性集合包含物件，以指定的原則，來判斷工具箱項目是否可以使用目的地元件的設計階段環境使用。The property collection contains objects that specify the policy that the design-time environment uses to determine whether a toolbox item can be used on the destination component. 如需有關限制的範圍而可以一起使用，請參閱文件類別。For more information on restricting the scope in which a can be used, see the documentation for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class System.Type type) cil managed

summary.span: 使用要建立的指定類型來初始化目前工具箱項目。

span.span: Initializes the current toolbox item with the specified type to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定工具箱項目來建立指定的型別，如果方法不已覆寫以不同的方式。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. 這個方法會執行下列作業：This method performs the following operations: - 設定屬性指出指定之型別的組件。Sets the property to an indicating the assembly of the specified type. - 設定根據指定的型別名稱與簡短的類型名稱的屬性。Sets the property to a short type name based on the name of the specified type. - 將任何屬性位於指定之型別屬性集合。Adds any attributes found on the specified type to the property collection.

span.span: The was locked.

span.span: Locks the toolbox item and prevents changes to its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鎖定時，無法變更工具箱項目的屬性。The properties of a toolbox item cannot be changed when it is locked.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreated(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreated (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs)

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 若要建立元件叫用工具箱項目之後，會呼叫這個方法和方法已經傳回。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components and the method has returned. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreating(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreating (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs)

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 之前建立的元件，叫用工具箱項目之後，會呼叫這個方法方法呼叫。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components, just before the method is called. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此點陣圖應該是 16 x 16 像素，應該用於在 Visual Studio 工具箱中，不是在設計介面上。This bitmap should be 16x16 pixels and should be used in the Visual Studio toolbox, not on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性字典變成唯讀之後已經鎖定工具箱項目。The property dictionary becomes read-only after the toolbox item has been locked. 屬性字典中的值會透過驗證方法，而且預設值取自方法。Values in the properties dictionary are validated through the method, and default values are obtained from the method.
